description:
The second event of the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, the Superbet Rapid & Blitz Poland Tournament, is scheduled to take place from May 17th until May 23rd, 2022, in Warsaw, Poland. The tournament will be a 10 player round-robin format, wherein the players will compete for a $175,000 prize fund.

If Jan-Krzysztof Duda places first place in the Rapid portion of the tournament, this market will resolve “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". If the Rapid portion of the tournament is cancelled or otherwise does not begin by June 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, the market will resolve to "No". If the Rapid portion of the tournament starts by June 1, 2022, but does not finish by June 8, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

This market is about the Rapid portion of Superbet Rapid & Blitz Poland Tournament. The results of the Blitz portion of this tournament will have no impact on the resolution of this market. 

The primary resolution source for this market will be https://grandchesstour.org/; however, other credible reporting may be used.

events.title: 2022 Grand Chess Tour: Will Jan-Krzysztof Duda win the Rapid portion of the Superbet Poland Tournament?
